arcane-shot.description: You learn to unleash special magical effects with some of your shots. When you gain this feature, you learn two Arcane Shot options of your choice.
details: Once per turn when you fire an arrow from a shortbow or longbow as part of the Attack action
You decide to use the option when the arrow hits, unless the option doesn't involve an attack roll
Additional options gained at levels 7, 10, 15, and 18

magic-arrow.description: You gain the ability to infuse arrows with magic. Whenever you fire a nonmagical arrow from a shortbow or longbow, you can make it magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage. The magic fades from the arrow immediately after it hits or misses its target.

curving-shot.description: When you make an attack roll with a magic arrow and miss, you can use a bonus action to reroll the attack roll against a different target within 60 feet of the original target.

ever-ready-shot.description: If you roll initiative and have no uses of Arcane Shot remaining, you regain one use of it.

banishing-arrow.effect: Target must make Charisma save or be banished. While banished, speed is 0 and is incapacitated. Returns at end of next turn.

beguiling-arrow.effect: Target must make Wisdom save or be charmed by chosen ally within 30ft until start of next turn

bursting-arrow.effect: Damages target and all creatures within 10 feet

enfeebling-arrow.effect: Target must make Constitution save or weapon attack damage is halved until start of next turn

grasping-arrow.effect: Speed reduced by 10ft, takes slashing damage on movement, can be removed with Athletics check

piercing-arrow.effect: 30ft line, 1ft wide, ignores cover and objects, Dexterity save for half damage

seeking-arrow.effect: No attack roll, targets creature seen in past minute, ignores cover, Dexterity save for half damage

shadow-arrow.effect: Target must make Wisdom save or can't see beyond 5ft until start of next turn
